abilities.name: Warped Interference
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a ranged attack targets that unit, models in it have the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

abilities.name: Wracking Agonies
abilities.rule: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one **INFANTRY** unit hit by one or more of those attacks made with its Agonising Energies. Until the start of your next turn, that unit is wracked with agonies. While a unit is wracked with agonies, subtract 2" from its Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for it.
